XMLDB.COMMENT: XMLDB file for Moodle ELIS Program Manager

FIELD.NAME: endtime
FIELD.COMMENT: the date the course must be completed by

TABLE.NAME: crlm_class_graded
TABLE.COMMENT: Elements from crlm_course_completion that have been recorded for a given class of that course.

FIELD.NAME: classid
FIELD.COMMENT: The foreign key id of crlm_class.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The foreign key if of crlm_user.

FIELD.NAME: completionid
FIELD.COMMENT: The foreign key id of crlm_course_completion.

FIELD.NAME: locked
FIELD.COMMENT: If locked, will not be updated by external systems.

FIELD.NAME: timegraded
FIELD.COMMENT: Time that the activity was graded in Moodle

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Last time stamp the grade was changed.

INDEX.NAME: class_user_idx
INDEX.COMMENT: Index for all user elements in a class.

FIELD.NAME: enroltype
FIELD.COMMENT: Automatically assign roles in Moodle course, or allow user to choose. 0 = auto; 1 = choice.

FIELD.NAME: enrolplugin
FIELD.COMMENT: The CM enrolment plug-in name used for this connection.

FIELD.NAME: completion_grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The grade required for course completion (0-100)

TABLE.NAME: crlm_course_completion
TABLE.COMMENT: Defines any extra elements that must be completed for a course.

FIELD.NAME: idnumber
FIELD.COMMENT: Unique identifier used to link with external grade elements.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Normal language name to give grade element.

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: Text field for further description of the element.

FIELD.NAME: completion_grade
FIELD.COMMENT: Grade to be achieved for course completion (0-100)

FIELD.NAME: required
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether this element is a required part of the completion, or is optional.

FIELD.NAME: completed
FIELD.COMMENT: Set if this assignment has been noted as completed.

FIELD.NAME: locked
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether or not this completion can be changed.

FIELD.NAME: transfercredits
FIELD.COMMENT: Credits applied to the undergraduate program from elsewhere.

FIELD.NAME: inactive
FIELD.COMMENT: Set to 1 if the user is inactive.

TABLE.NAME: crlm_usercluster
TABLE.COMMENT: Contains cluster assignments for CM users.

FIELD.NAME: autoenrol
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether users should be autoenrolled in tracks associated with this cluster.

FIELD.NAME: leader
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether or not the user is a cluster leader

TABLE.NAME: crlm_config
TABLE.COMMENT: The config elements for the curriculum management system.

TABLE.NAME: crlm_notification_log
TABLE.COMMENT: Contains logs of notifications for events.

FIELD.NAME: instance
FIELD.COMMENT: An id of an element instance that the event was generated for.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: CM user id that the notification was sent to.

FIELD.NAME: fromuserid
FIELD.COMMENT: PM user id that triggered the notification.

FIELD.NAME: data
FIELD.COMMENT: Any other data needed for the notification log.

INDEX.NAME: event_inst_user_ix
INDEX.COMMENT: An index based on the event, user and instance.

INDEX.NAME: event_inst_fuser_ix
INDEX.COMMENT: An index based on the event, from user and instance.

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: Text field for further description of the element.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Last time stamp the grade was changed.

TABLE.NAME: crlm_cluster_profile
TABLE.COMMENT: Profile fields to use for automatic cluster association.

FIELD.NAME: value
FIELD.COMMENT: Value of field for automatically assigning a user to the cluster.

FIELD.NAME: plugin
FIELD.COMMENT: The cluster plugin that made this assignment.

FIELD.NAME: autoenrol
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether users should be autoenrolled in tracks associated with this cluster. (If any plugins have this flag set, then the final cluster assignment will have this flag set.)

FIELD.NAME: leader
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether or not the user is a cluster leader

FIELD.NAME: autounenrol
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether or not to remove a user from classes when removed from cluster

TABLE.NAME: crlm_user_moodle
TABLE.COMMENT: Association between Moodle and CM users

FIELD.NAME: triggerstartdate
FIELD.COMMENT: Indicates what date to base the trigger on

FIELD.NAME: days
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of days to offset from trigger date

TABLE.NAME: crlm_certificate_settings
TABLE.COMMENT: Certificate settings for ELIS entity instances and types

FIELD.NAME: disable
FIELD.COMMENT: A flag to denote that the ELIS entity is not using certificates

INDEX.NAME: ent_id_type_idx
INDEX.COMMENT: Entity id and type unique index

FIELD.NAME: timeissued
FIELD.COMMENT: Time certificate was issued to user
